ygData.subject: Re: Concerns With SK Class
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with the HT arguement...its too often resisted and sometimes it doesn t even do full damage which it should....for only being used once a
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with the HT arguement...its too often resisted and sometimes it
doesn't even do full damage which it should....for only being used once a
day...sometimes its pretty worthless. The spell list is alright...i think
if we had at least on more movement spell...or maybe another way of
getting HP back...because unless you are a Troll....its takes a long time
to get HP and i only have a little bit over 200 at 8th level.

Korm
